caption.p: The cytotoxicity test in H 2O 2 treatment for 4 h (a), Millingtonia hortensis treatment for 24 h (b), and Hispidulin treatment for 24 h (c) were analyzed by using 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide assay in SK-N-SH cells. The values present the mean Â± standard error of the mean from 3 independent experiments. ** P < 0.01, *** P < 0.001, in comparison with the control treatment
